src:
Festival Kopi Nusantara IV, Produksi Kopi Bondowoso Diharapkan Tembus Pasar Internasional
02 Nov 2019, 22:10 by Sandy


Festival Kopi Nusantara IV, Produksi Kopi Bondowoso Diharapkan Tembus Pasar Internasional

KBRN, Bondowoso: Untuk keempat kalinya, Festival Kopi Nusantara (FKN) 2019 yang diprakarsai oleh Dinas Pertanian bersama komunitas dan petani kopi, digelar untuk menyuguhkan hasil pertanian kopi Kabupaten Bondowoso. Acara ini bertujuan untuk mempertemukan pelaku industri kopi dan coffe lovers dari hulu ke hilir. Dwi Wardhana, Kepala Dinas Pertanian (Disperta) Bondowoso, Sabtu (2/11/19) mengatakan, FKN IV 2019 bertujuan untuk mempromosikan kopi Bondowoso ke kancah Nasional maupun Internasional, mengeksplor cita rasa kopi dan mengangkat nilai jual kopi Bondowoso. " Tentunya juga agar meningkatkan kesejahteraan petani kopi Bondowoso," jelasnya.Selain itu, kegiatan ini juga menjadi arena alternatif baru di bidang wisata edukasi pertanian khususnya komoditi kopi. Untuk diketahui, FKN kali ini terdapat tiga jenis kompetisi yang dilaksanakan antara lain Speciality Coffe Competition, Late Art Competition dan Brewing Competition. Dari tiga kompetisi kopi tersebut, total peserta yang berpartisipasi dalam FKN 4 2019 sebanyak 149 orang. Tidak hanya dari Bondowoso, namun perserta FKN 4 2019 juga diikuti oleh peserta yang berasal dari  Banten, Temanggung, Wonosobo, Surabaya, Malang, Pasuruan, Probolinggo dan beberapa kawasan lainnya.Meski gerimis, namun antusiasme masyarakat Bondowoso untuk menikmati malam minggu dengan berbagai jenis minuman kopi cukup tinggi. Diiringi dengan tarian molong kopi, FKN 4 2019 juga dihibur oleh konser musik bertemakan kopi.(san)
text:
Nusantara IV Coffee Festival, Bondowoso Coffee Production Expected to Penetrate the International Market
02 Nov 2019, 22:10 by Sandy


Nusantara IV Coffee Festival, Bondowoso Coffee Production Expected to Penetrate the International Market

KBRN, Bondowoso: For the fourth time, the 2019 Nusantara Coffee Festival (FKN), which was initiated by the Department of Agriculture together with the community and coffee farmers, was held to present the coffee yields of the Bondowoso Regency. This event aims to bring together coffee and coffee lovers from upstream to downstream. Dwi Wardhana, Head of the Agriculture Office (Disperta) of Bondowoso, on Saturday (11/2/19) said that FKN IV 2019 aims to promote Bondowoso coffee to the national and international arena, explore the taste of coffee and raise the selling value of Bondowoso coffee. "Certainly also in order to improve the welfare of Bondowoso coffee farmers," he explained. In addition, this activity also became a new alternative arena in the field of agricultural education tourism, especially coffee commodities. To note, this time FKN there are three types of competitions carried out including the Specialty Coffe Competition, Late Art Competition and Brewing Competition. Of the three coffee competitions, a total of 149 participants participated in FKN 4 2019. Not only from Bondowoso, but FKN 4 2019 participants were also attended by participants from Banten, Temanggung, Wonosobo, Surabaya, Malang, Pasuruan, Probolinggo and several other areas. Despite the drizzle, but the enthusiasm of the Bondowoso community to enjoy Sunday night with various types of drinks coffee is quite high. Accompanied by the coffee molong dance, FKN 4 2019 was also entertained by a coffee-themed music concert. (San)
